text: hananim-i ulileul guhasa u liga neohui jong-gyolo dol-agandamyeon sil lo ulineun hananimkke geojishage doem ila hananim-i wonhaji anihasi ni uliga geugeos-eulo dol-agam-i hab dangchi anh-eum-ila junim-eun modeun geos-eul geubun-ui jihyean-e dusyeoss-euni juyeo jeohuineun hananimkke uijonhanaida jinlilosseo jeohuiwa i baegseongdeul-eul simpan hayeo jusoseo dangsin-iya mallo gajang hullyunghan simpanja isibnida
